and g.game_id = #{gameId}

SELECT g.game_id gameId, g.game_name gameName, IF(d.bet_count IS NULL, 0, d.bet_count) betCount, IF(d.reward_count IS NULL, 0, d.reward_count) rewardCount, IF(d.fee_count IS NULL, 0, d.fee_count) feeCount FROM config_game g LEFT JOIN (SELECT table_id,SUM(bet_count) bet_count, SUM(reward_count) reward_count, SUM(fee_count) fee_count FROM data_game_day WHERE channel IN (SELECT t_id FROM sys_tenant WHERE tenant = #{tid} AND t_type = '2') AND DAY >= #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} >= DAY GROUP BY table_id) d ON g.game_id = d.table_id WHERE g.parent_id = #{gameId}
